titles: Oaths appointed to be taken instead of the oaths of allegiance and supremacy and declaration.
author: Leverett, John.
England and Wales. Parliament.
notes: Oath of allegiance to King William III and opposition to the Pope and declaration of disbelief in Catholic doctrines and practices.
Signed in manuscript: John Leverett, Samuel Layman, Thomas Browne, Jam.s Converse.
This item appears at reels 723:8 and 1356:4.
Wing number E1676 (at reel position 1356:4) cancelled in Wing (CD-ROM, 1996).
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
keywords: Great Britain --  Kings and rulers --  Succession.
